data.name: Storm Swordsman Demo
data.detailed_description:
▉ Precautions

This test is to get feedback on game bugs and game runs.
Looking forward to getting your valuable feedback, thank you very much!
After getting enough feedback, this test will end and the download will be canceled, please forgive me.

-------------------------------------------------- -

The game works are all machine translations.
If there are inappropriate or offensive sentences, I hope you forgive me and are very sorry.

-------------------------------------------------- -

▉ Game content
Players will play the role of a wandering swordsman who accepts a commission from a friend who has not seen him for many years.
Execute a state-secret assassination mission, passing through various areas of Benming, and engage in death battles with ninjas and swordsmen you encounter.
Will the player be able to complete this difficult task or will they become the ghost of the sword?
Or keep getting stronger and eventually become the strongest swordsman?
《The game style is closer to the pace and difficulty of Dark Souls. More suitable for hardcore gamers who like a challenge.》



▉ Game Combat
The combat moves that can be carried out are,
Jump, Dash, Defense, Light Slash, Heavy Slash, Backstab, Counterattack, and five skills.
Players have three values ​​of physical strength, vigor, and endurance.
And thirty skill scrolls that can change abilities can be equipped.



▉ Operation mode (mainly XBOX controller)
A: jump
X: Light Slash
Y: Heavy Slash
B: Tiger Shadow
RB: skill set
RT: Sprint
LB: Menu
LT: Defense
RB+A: Tiger Chong
RB+X: Huya
RB+Y: Tiger Claw
RB+B: Tiger Shadow Kill
LT+RT: Counterattack

▉ Frequently Asked Questions
【1】 It is prompted that "○○.dll" does not exist at startup.
Please try installing the "Trial Version" of "Pixel Game Maker MV".

【2】How to open the setting menu.
While the game is running, press the "F1" key to display the menu bar at the top.

【3】How to set language and configure buttons.
When the game is running, press "F1" to open the setting menu, where you can make settings.

data.short_description: This is a 2D action adventure game of stealth assassination, swordsmanship and ninjutsu duel! There is no refreshing combo, and there is no Wushuang who mows the grass. hesitates will not lose, but carelessness will die! In the world of swordsmen, the victory or defeat is in the blink of an eye!
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo and 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

  • OS: Windows 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo and 3.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU / NVIDIA GeForce GTX750 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
